documentation.text: @dev Converts a `uint256` to its ASCII `string` representation.

opcodes: PUSH20 0x0 ADDRESS EQ PUSH1 0x80 PUSH1 0x40 MSTORE PUSH1 0x0 DUP1 REVERT INVALID LOG2 PUSH5 0x6970667358 0x22 SLT KECCAK256 PUSH6 0xF5709BE935BA PUSH24 0x1B930F82794B743CD606C2F2E77DCFD753B5AC00F0687200 PUSH5 0x736F6C6343 STOP MOD MOD STOP CALLER
